revised_title: On Classes of Summable Functions and Their Fourier Series: A Generalization of Schwarz's Inequality
tldr: The author explores classes of summable functions and their Fourier series, focusing on generalizing Schwarz's inequality. They demonstrate how this generalization can be used to extend the theory of summable functions and improve methods for integrating Fourier series. This work has implications for understanding the properties of various functions and their applications in mathematical analysis and functional analysis.
